title: Did John McCain's vote stop repealing the Anti-Corruption Act for fiscal year 2017?
subtitle: There is an online theory that overestimates the consequences of the vote of the Senator of Arizona in July 2017 to repeal the Affordable Care Act.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: John McCain's vote against the "simple cancellation" proposal for health care stopped attempts to repeal the Affordable Care Act for fiscal year 17.
